Name: 天岚行 - Through the Mist and Sky
About the game: Between the Kingdoms of Fenn and Leceron sits the narrow neutral zone Mount Aer. With heroes, mystical beasts, and the surrounding legends, the mountain has attracted all but the most mundane, yet has veiled itself from the world, with nothing known except the countless myths. And as a young man begins his venture into Mount Aer, only more mysteries will be unveiled. Features: - A QTE focused battle system with real-time elements - Side quest boss fights that vary greatly in flavors, strategies and difficulties - Heavily customizable character roles depending on equipment - Fast-paced plot designed for completion under 8 hours, with an increasingly open-ended world as the story progresses Note: If QTE keys malfunction, please press F1 and reconfigure your keys under the “Keyboard, Joystick” tab.
